info.title: ExoAPI
info.description: Universal API for developers - Geocoding, HTML rendering, barcode generation & more

tags.name: Barcode generator
tags.description: The easiest QR code & barcode generator API 🤳

tags.name: Content moderation
tags.description: Scale faster with AI-powered content moderation 🛡️✨

tags.name: Unit converter
tags.description: The simplest unit & currency conversion API

post.description: Generate high quality QR code & barcode images in a matter of seconds

value.description: Content to encode into the code

width.description: Width of the PNG code image

height.description: Height of the PNG code image

fitWidth.description: Stretch barcodes to exactly fit the `width`. Due to the nature of barcodes, where every bar's width is a multiple of the narrowest bar, stretching may result in slightly blurry images, which are more difficult for devices to scan.

get.description: Automatically detect unwanted content and enforce your moderation rules

examples: I love this restaurant, the view isn't nice but the food is always great!
schema.description: Text content to moderate (500 characters maximum)

safetyScore.description: Score between 0 and 1 expressing how safe the content is

reason.description: Short explanation of the text moderation analysis
examples: Positive sentiment with a minor complaint about the view.

hateSpeechScore.description: Probability between 0 and 1 of the text containing hate speech

dangerousContentScore.description: Probability between 0 and 1 of the text containing dangerous elements

harassmentScore.description: Probability between 0 and 1 of the text containing harassment

sexuallyExplicitScore.description: Probability between 0 and 1 of the text containing sexually explicit language

spamScore.description: Probability between 0 and 1 of the text containing spam or clikbait content

post.description: Generate high-quality PDF documents or images from HTML

title.description: Title of the generated PDF document or PNG image

imageHeight.description: PNG image height (in pixels). In not specified, the height will automatically adapt to the content

pageSize.description: Default page size of the generated PDF document

pageWidth.description: Explicit PDF width (in px, mm, in or cm)

pageHeight.description: Explicit PDF height (in px, mm, in or cm)

margin.description: PDF page margin (in px, mm, in or cm)

marginLeft.description: PDF left margin (in px, mm, in or cm)

marginRight.description: PDF right margin (in px, mm, in or cm)

marginTop.description: PDF top margin (in px, mm, in or cm)

marginBottom.description: PDF bottom margin (in px, mm, in or cm)

header.description: HTML page header content. Use special CSS classes to inject parameters: "date", "pageNumber", "totalPages"
examples: Page of

footer.description: HTML page footer content. Use special CSS classes to inject parameters: "date", "pageNumber", "totalPages"
examples: Page of

get.description: Effortlessly convert GPS coordinates to human-readable addresses

address.description: Formatted address according to locale parameter
examples: 221B Baker Street, London NW1 6XE, United Kingdom

get.description: Quickly convert between all different kinds of measurement units
